title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases that were set for the columns in the dataset when selecting it.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the expression builder. 2. Select a dataset that has aliases set for its columns. 3. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
